description: A Flutter widget named RatingStars that displays a static star rating with support for half-star representation. It takes a rating value, icon size, and optional color to render up to 5 stars accordingly.

classes.name: RatingStars
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that visually represents a star rating, supporting full and half stars based on a floating-point rating value.

methods.name: RatingStars
methods.description: Constructor for the RatingStars widget, requiring a rating value and optional size and color parameters.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method that creates a row of 5 icons representing the star rating, with full, half, or empty star icons based on the rating.
